page.title: 09Life Styles in Whitley
page.content: The Life Styles of people in Whitley vary sometimes because their household amenities differ. There are 540 people in Whitley and l93 houses.The majority of houses have 7 or more rooms. There are 6 households lacking a bath, nine households lacking a toilet and six houses lacking both a bath and toilet. There are 5 households with more than one person per room. There are 186 private houses. The average number of people per house is three. 34 houses contain only one person. There are 24 houses without a car. Eighty houses with one car & 96 houses with 2 cars. There are only 14 council houses in Whitley, the rest are privately owned or rented. In l981 the ages of people were: 0-4 years=about 31. 5-15 years= 85. 16-24 years=about 82. 25-O.A.P. = about 253. 65-75 years = about 51. 75-84 years=about3l and 85+ years =4.
